all_card.description: Securely manage these sensitive keys. Do not share them with anyone. If you suspect that one of your API keys has been compromised, you should create a new key, change the compromised key in your code, then delete the compromised key.
all_card.title: API keys

alert.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this API key and remove its access to all devices.
alert.title: Are you absolutely sure?
